thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: Krista

author: Krista
title: Krista
text: I've been ordering film (occasionally) through B&H for a few years now (since I started getting into film photography), and they have been great. I live in a smaller town in San Diego county, and I really wish there was a B&H location within driving distance to me. I am getting into black & white film photography, now that I've been forced to send my film out for development, so I will definitely start purchasing film again, this time in larger quantities and more often. Thank you B&H for continuing to support an older, but much loved, format: Film! :)
